aboutme.info: I started my career during my studies as a computer scientist. I gained my first experiences in web development during my 6-month internship at the Fraunhofer Institut. I deepened my knowledge at Neue Fische as a trainee to advance my career as a frontend developer. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities for further education. Due to my commitment and high motivation, I am convinced that I can make a valuable contribution as a team member.
